ygData.subject: Re: everquest-jewelry making, thus far..
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, there is no Jade in Freeport. Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server) Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, there is no Jade in Freeport.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Miller, Keith A. [mailto:keithm@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 1:39 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: everquest-jewelry making, thus far..
>
>
> From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>
> Freeport is probably a good place to do jewelry, since that militia belt
> quest improves your faction with the local merchants. I recomend you
> get everyone nice and friendly to you before you spend much money, as
> jewelry is a big platinum sucking black hole!
>
